Name: 2D Owen
About the game: 2D Owen is an arcade platformer in which you can explore 8 different worlds & experience a lot of adventures. Game features: - Run, jump, and swim through many exciting levels - Use Umbrella to jump, fly & shoot - Fly with a Jetpack, Hang-Glider, Rocket Boots and Balloon - Jump with the Pogo Stick and Bouncy Ball - Ride a Cart, Rocket Rollers and Rolling Ball - Explore 120 levels in 8 different worlds - Defeat enemies & avoid many various obstacles - Find secret locations & gain extra points
